songs.title: Good Crazy
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus: PARTYNEXTDOOR]
You're the good kind of crazy
Mama live with you and not the other way
I rate it, you're the good kind of crazy
You're so bad, that you bad for me, baby
The good kind of crazy

[Post-Chorus: PARTYNEXTDOOR, Jeremih, Both]
Yeah, yeah
You're the good kind of crazy
Yeah (yeah, yeah), yeah (oh yeah)
Yeah

[Verse 1: Jeremih & PARTYNEXTDOOR]
I need you to go down for me, babe
Go deep, I don't got ex's just ecstasy, baby
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
You got me out here looking crazy
You calling somebody else baby
I treat you nothing but a lady
Oh no, no (oh yeah, yeah)

[Chorus: PARTYNEXTDOOR]
You're the good kind of crazy
Mama live with you and not the other way
I rate it, you're the good kind of crazy
You're so bad, that you bad for me, baby
The good kind of crazy

[Post-Chorus: PARTYNEXTDOOR]
Yeah, yeah
You're the good kind of crazy
Yeah, yeah
Yeah

[Verse 2: PARTYNEXTDOOR & Jeremih]
Dont make a fool out of me, babe
Don't make a tool out of me, babe
Don't make a screw out of me, babe
Shawty don't get me crazy
I've been patient, girl
Been waiting, yeah
For you to want what I need
Good type of crazy (good type of crazy)

[Chorus: PARTYNEXTDOOR]
You're the good kind of crazy
Mama live with you and not the other way
I rate it, you're the good kind of crazy
You're so bad, that you bad for me, baby
The good kind of crazy

[Post-Chorus: PARTYNEXTDOOR]
Yeah, yeah
You're the good kind of crazy
Yeah, yeah
Yeah
